Text: Preston VPP Model Cc Per your request the Preston VPP Model is attached It of course will need to be updated with the commodity prices we lock into If you have any questions please let me know Mark x

Updated Agenda for Meeting with Crescendo on Wednesday July Cc Ken Jim Arrive Mark begins discussion on VPP Model Assumptions and Explanation Scott Arvel etc to discuss Critical Path forward Ken Jim visit with Scott and Steve regarding issues NPI etc Joan Eric Mark discuss Put Swaptions on Entrada Gas and remaining VPP issues Lunch either inhouse or offcampus depending on needs Talk about Field Development Plans with Arvel Walt Chris and Steve Meet with Audrey and Rusty Meet with Gerald Nemec Pipeline Attorney Remaining Issues We will be in EB for all meetings Please let me know if you would like to be included in the lunch plans so preparations can be made as necessary Thanks Mark x
Northwest Pipeline ContactJim Osborne asked that I pass on this Williams NWPL contact Steve Kofoed fax Mark

Crescendo VPP Transaction Structure Cc the attached diagram describing the Crescendo VPP Transaction It displays the flow of volumes and dollars between Crescendo Entrada the ENA Physical Desk and the ENA Financial Desk If you have any questions please contact Joan or Mark
Crescendo Rosteris a roster of the people working on Crescendo internally and externally Please let me know of any updates changes or additions Thanks Mark x
Tom Brown Kinder Morgan Wildhorse Press ReleaseTeam Click on the website below for the news release on the Kinder Morgan and Tom Brown distribution of Wildhorse assets prnewscotombrohtml

Agenda for November Meeting with Crescendois an agenda for the business meeting with Crescendo this Thursday We will be meeting am to pm Due to a tight time schedule lunch will be brought in Please let me know today if you will be in the meeting during lunch Mark Whitt if you want to call in or have us call you for any portion of it please let me know Thanks Mark Castiglione

Strategy on Tom BrownWildhorseI spoke with Audrey today who mentioned that their meeting with Tom Brown has gone well She has asked me to set up a meeting regarding Strategy on this potential acquisition Lets plan to meet at am this Friday in room EB Thanks Mark

Wildhorse South Gathering System SummaryAttached is a very rough draft of a book to be put together describing the potential Crescendo purchase of the Wildhorse South Gathering System There are still a lot of holes and I would appreciate you adding your knowledge to improve it Please call me with your suggestions Thanks Mark x
CrescendoTom Brown Model and Bookare the latest versions of the model and book Please let me know your comments and questions Mark

Tom Brown Model and Bookis a revised book and model per our discussion in the meeting this morning Gerald researched the gathering contracts and found that they are mostly in mmbtu instead of mcf This knocks down the value of gathering all the entrada reserves down by about mm and thus total value is now at mm The value of the Dakota gas is not impacted much

Status ReportBelow is a status report from Ken for the Colorado Project You might want to print this out and bring to the meeting for reference This is not an agenda for the meeting just extra information for reference Mark Forwarded by Mark CastiglioneCorpEnron on AM Ken on AM Please respond to To Mark Castiglione Email cc Subject Status Report Mark I am sending a status report on the progress of the Colorado project I think it may help to work from this for the Tuesday morning meeting or in lieu of the meeting You are the only one I have sent this to so please distribute to those in ENA that need to see it Thanks Ken STATUS REPORT doc

Status UpdateTeam As you know we are not having a meeting today Attached below is a status report from Ken Forwarded by Mark CastiglioneCorpEnron on AM Ken on AM Please respond to To Mark Castiglione Email cc Subject Status Update Mark Please distribute as necessary for conference call if we are having one Ken STATUS REPORT doc

Crescendo in the Office TomorrowKrisa and Jim Osborne will be here tomorrow to discuss what they proposed bidding on the Wildhorse System Bids are due this Friday The meeting will run from about am to am in ECRs big conference room EB

Project Status ReportForwarded by Mark CastiglioneCorpEnron on AM Ken on AM Please respond to To Mark Castiglione Email cc Subject Project Status Report Mark Attached is a status report to be used for the meeting Please distribute Ken STATUS REPORT doc

FW Crescendo Status ReportMessage From Ken ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESKenCkckrisaapexEnetE NRONco m Sent Monday March PM To Castiglione Mark Subject Crescendo Status Report Mark Attached is a status report for Crescendo Energy LLC dated Please distribute to ENA personnel Ken Krisa STATUS REPORT doc

FW Status Report Tues Phone Mtgam forwarding an electronic version of Crescendos biweekly status report Those of you in the meeting this morning already have a hard copy Mark Original Message From Ken ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESKenCkckrisaapexEnetE NRONco m Sent Tuesday April AM To Castiglione Mark Subject Status Report Tues Phone Mtg Mark Heres an updated status report Please distribute within ENA Dave Owen will be here today and we are scheduled to be at BCCK by about this morning Jim is in transit to Grand Junction Our contract landman was out all last week so not much progress was made last week on the acquisitions Is there still going to be a conference call Ken Krisa STATUS REPORT doc

Vacation Cc I am planning to be on vacation from Monday October through Wednesday October Any issues or questions regarding Crescendo that you normally come to me for can probably be addressed by Joan or Arvel Thanks Mark
